sentences.text: they asked if i felt ok and could drive myself.
when i said yes, they said they’d call the hospital and give them my info and let them know i’m coming.
they said i may have to stay for a couple days on iv antibiotics because i had sepsis, an infection spreading through my blood stream.
i had to get lots of medicine, but only stayed in the hospital for one day.
apparently it was so serious because once the infection passes a certain threshold, people go from feeling fine like i did to deathly ill in minutes.

chunks.raw_summary: i had sepsis, an infection spreading through my blood stream . i had to get lots of medicine, but only stayed in the hospital for one day . Apparently it was so serious because once the infection passes a certain threshold, people go from feeling fine like i did to deathly ill in minutes .
